Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "time flies" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: It felt like summer vacation had just started, but suddenly it was time to go back to school. "I can't believe it's September already!" said Lucas. "Time flies when you're having fun."
answers: Time seems to pass very quickly

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "is a busy bee" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Mom is always doing something. In the morning, she makes breakfast and packs lunches. After work, she drives the kids to activities, helps with homework, and makes dinner. Dad says Mom is a busy bee who never stops moving.
answers: She is always busy and hardworking

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "his heart sank" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Jordan was hoping to go to the beach with his friends, but when he looked outside, dark clouds filled the sky and rain was starting to fall. His heart sank as he realized the trip would have to be cancelled.
answers: He suddenly felt very sad and disappointed

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "is a rock" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: When things got hard for the family, Dad stayed calm and strong. He helped everyone feel better and made sure everything was taken care of. Mom told the kids, "Your father is a rock that we can always count on."
answers: He is dependable, strong, and steady  someone you can rely on

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "laughter is the best medicine" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: After being sick for a few days, Emma was feeling down. Her brother came in and told her silly jokes that made her laugh so hard her stomach hurt. "See?" Mom said. "Laughter is the best medicine!"
answers: Laughing and being happy can help you feel better

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "is a social butterfly" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: At the party, Mia went from group to group talking to everyone. She made new friends, told stories, and had conversations with people she'd never met before. Her mom smiled and said Mia is a social butterfly.
answers: She is very friendly and outgoing, enjoys talking to many people

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "it was a breeze" mean?

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "butterflies in her stomach" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Right before her dance performance, Lily felt nervous. Her stomach felt fluttery and she couldn't sit still. She told her mom she had butterflies in her stomach.
answers: her stomach feels fluttery from nerves

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "had a broken heart" mean?

answers: He feels very sad, especially from losing someone he cares about

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "sharp as a tack" mean?

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "light at the end of the tunnel" mean?

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "has a green thumb" mean?

answers: She is very good at growing plants and gardening

Metaphors - Identify The Meaning - Multi.question: What does "Dana is a chicken" mean?
Metaphors - Identify The Meaning - Multi.paragraph: Christina is at the town pool with her friends Dana and Hailey. Hailey announced that she wanted to jump off the high dive, and Christina said it sounded like fun. However, Dana got really quiet, and didn't follow them towards the high dive. Hailey turned around and said that Dana is a chicken. Christina told Hailey that wasn't nice, and then told Dana she would swim with her.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as gentle as a lamb" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Hannah recently visited her uncle at his new house. When she first arrived, she was shocked to see that he not only got a new house, but also a new dog! Hannah was nervous to enter the house because the dog was gigantic, and she was sure that he would jump up on her and knock her over. However, her uncle said his dog is as gentle as a lamb, and Hannah didn't have to worry.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "like a rocket" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Marcus was so excited when his family arrived at the beach. As soon as his mom said he could go, he took off like a rocket toward the water. His little sister tried to keep up, but Marcus was way too fast. He couldn't wait to jump in the waves!

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "out like a light" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: After spending all day swimming and building sandcastles, Emma was exhausted. When her head hit the pillow that night, she was out like a light. Her mom came to check on her ten minutes later, and Emma was already in a deep sleep.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as clean as a whistle" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Dad spent all Saturday morning cleaning the house because Grandma was coming to visit. He scrubbed the floors, wiped the counters, and washed all the dishes. By the time he was done, the kitchen was as clean as a whistle. Grandma was very impressed.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as packed as sardines" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: We went to the beach on the Fourth of July weekend. It was so crowded! The parking lot was full, and people were everywhere. The beach was as packed as sardines. We could barely find a spot to put our towels down.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "like a wolf" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Tyler hadn't eaten since breakfast, and by dinnertime he was starving. When Mom put the food on the table, he ate like a wolf. In just five minutes, his plate was completely empty. Mom reminded him to slow down next time!

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as quiet as a mouse" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: During the movie, Lily sat as quiet as a mouse. She didn't make a single sound because she didn't want to miss any part of the story. Her parents were proud of how well she behaved.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "like a kangaroo" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: At the trampoline park, Jake could jump really high. His friends said he bounced like a kangaroo. He could almost touch the ceiling! Everyone wanted to see how high he could go.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as cold as ice" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: When Sophia got out of the pool, she started shivering right away. The wind was blowing, and she felt as cold as ice. She quickly wrapped herself in a towel and sat in the warm sun.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as brave as a lion" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: It was Aiden's first time going off the high dive. He was a little nervous, but he didn't show it. He walked to the edge of the board as brave as a lion and jumped right in. Everyone cheered for him!

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "like a dolphin" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Maya has been taking swim lessons since she was three years old. Now she swims like a dolphin. She glides through the water so smoothly and can hold her breath for a long time. Her coach says she's a natural.

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as hot as fire" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: It was the middle of summer, and the temperature was over 100 degrees. The sand at the beach was as hot as fire. We had to wear our flip flops just to walk to the water without burning our feet!

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as slow as a snail" mean?
Similes - Identify The Meaning.paragraph: Noah didn't want to leave the beach. When his mom said it was time to go, he packed up his things as slow as a snail. He took forever to fold his towel and pick up his toys. Mom had to tell him to hurry up three times!

Similes - Identify The Meaning.question: What does "as still as a statue" mean?
